struct Loki::CreateUsing< Alloc >

Implementation of the CreationPolicy used by SingletonHolder Creates objects using a custom allocater. Usage: e.g. CreateUsing<std::allocator>::Allocator /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////.
